::DarkMouse:;

She watched the bug fly off.  She felt pale with the fear of what 
Megatron was going to do to her.  Then she remembered that her body 
was different.  It gave her a small edge on things.  

She looked at Aracnia, "Do you know what Megatron is going to do?"  
She shook her head.  "I'm as good as scrap. Why did you bring me back 
to life just to have me return to death?"  She looked down and sighed.
"well, might as well join it now then later on I guess."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron shighs as he looks out onto the battle feild. That 
little dog 
> was supposed to have settled this thing. He went out, and opened 
fire.
> 
>     Waspinator soars down from the sky and dives right into the 
bunker 
> opening like a flash. He jets down the tunnle, and sets down in the 
Triangle 
> room.
>     "Hello mouse bot!" He said to Darkmouse, and then walked past 
them to 
> Black Aracnia.
>     "Megatron wants to know why you cut of communications. Hes very 
mad...."
>     Aracnia shook her head. "Tell him to come here, now that the 
communicator 
> is broken. Take Atma and his ally with you to assist in the battle. 
Ok?"
>     Waspinator nodded and turned to Darkmouse. "Bub bye mousey. 
Hehehe." And 
> then flew away.
